categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Hound" was the nickname of a clone trooper pilot who flew an LAAT/i gunship during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Separatist Alliance. Hound participated in the Battle of Mon Cala, where he piloted a gunship over the ocean and dropped clone SCUBA troopers from the company led by Clone Commander "Monnk."
